subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, who led the Nets to the N.B.A. finals in 2002 and 2003, has placed his name in the candidate pool, according to a person briefed on the team’s search.
snippet: Jason Kidd, who led the Nets to the N.B.A. finals in 2002 and 2003, has placed his name in the candidate pool, according to a person briefed on the team’s search.
